Hi there! Welcome to our support chat.
Hi, I'm looking for information about your pricing plans.
Of course! We offer three plans: Basic, Pro, and Enterprise. Which one are you interested in?
Can you tell me more about the Pro plan?
The Pro plan costs $29.99 per month and includes all Basic features plus advanced analytics, priority support, and up to 10 team members.
That sounds perfect for my needs. How do I sign up?
You can sign up on our website by clicking the 'Get Started' button and selecting the Pro plan during checkout.
